title: 《環看天下》：泰國自豪泰黨成第一大黨據報正在商議組閣
news_content:
泰國下議院選舉後，自豪泰黨成為第一大黨，但議席未能過半，要合組聯合政府。該黨總理第一候選人、看守政府總理阿努廷正商議組閣。選舉中所得議席排第二的人民黨表明，不會加入自豪泰黨主導的執政聯盟，相信要聯合其他較細小黨派組閣。

title: Google plans to issue 100-year bonds to help fund AI
news_content:
Google-parent Alphabet will issue bonds maturing in 100 years as it continues to invest massively in infrastructure for artificial intelligence, according to data published on Tuesday by Bloomberg.

The Silicon Valley internet giant reportedly aims to raise about US$20 billion overall, a chunk of it by issuing bonds that mature in February of 2126, with lenders so keen for a piece of the AI action that some US$100 billion orders were placed for the debt.

Alphabet did not respond to a request for comment.

Alphabet and AI race rivals including Amazon, Meta, Microsoft are investing staggering amounts in infrastructure to power the technology, banking on it paying off.

Market reaction, though, has been mixed with some investors worried spending has gone overboard.

Century-long bond issues by companies are a rarity, and especially for Alphabet which has ample online ad revenue available to pay for investments rather than resorting to debt.

But, the rush to lead in AI has changed the game, calling for unprecedented spending on data centres, energy generation and more.

Alphabet allocated US$91 billion to spending on computing infrastructure last year and has told financial analysts it expects to spend from US$175 billion to US$185 billion on it this year.

Alphabet has ramped up long-term debt to handle the spending surge, issuing 50-year bonds late last year.

While 100-year bonds are not new, it has been decades since US companies have resorted to them.

Companies such as Disney, Coca-Cola, FedEx, Ford, and Motorola turned to such century-long debt during the 1990s. (AFP)

title: 聯儲局官員：對經濟謹慎樂觀　繼續觀察就業及通脹數據表現
news_content:
有聯儲局官員表示，對美國經濟謹慎樂觀，利率走勢將視乎經濟數據表現。

達拉斯聯儲銀行總裁洛根表示，在目前政策利率設置下，對通脹向2%目標回落，及就業市場保持穩定持謹慎樂觀態度。如果未來幾個月經濟數據實現相關預期，反映目前政策立場合適，無需進一步減息。但如果通脹回落，勞動力市場降溫，可能需要再次減息。

她提到，經過去年3次減息後，勞動力市場的下行風險似乎已顯著消退，但減息同時增加通脹風險。她相信今年通脹將取得進展，因關稅推高物價的效應將逐漸消退，住房服務通脹在租賃需求下降的情況下持續放緩，勞動力市場供需平衡將紓緩非住房服務通脹壓力。但仍憂慮部分關稅效應尚未顯現，監管放鬆與新技術發展亦可能推高物價。

另外，克利夫蘭聯儲銀行總裁哈瑪克表示，對經濟活動前景謹慎樂觀，聯儲局不急於調整利率，可能在相當長的一段時間內按兵不動。她表示，目前正處於良好位置，傾向於保持耐心，評估近期減息的影響並監測經濟表現。

哈瑪克指出，經濟前景雖然樂觀，但通脹水平仍過高，強調在通脹可能持續徘徊於3%的風險下，紓緩價格壓力至關重要。



編輯：張詩民

title: US stocks mixed as retail sales data disappoint
news_content:
The S&P 500 and the Nasdaq closed lower on Tuesday while the Dow edged up to its third record close in a row, as investors digested disappointing retail sales figures and waited for a ⁠key labour market report. 

The S&P 500 communication services sector was the market's weakest sector, weighed down by Alphabet shares, which fell 1.8 percent after Google's parent said it sold bonds worth US$20 billion.

The announcement played in to investor worries about the amount of money technology companies say they must spend to support the artificial-intelligence boom, with Amazon, Alphabet, Meta and Microsoft collectively set to spend hundreds of billions in 2026 as they race for AI dominance. 

Meanwhile, US retail sales unexpectedly stalled in December as households scaled back spending on vehicles and other big-ticket items, suggesting a slower growth path for consumer spending and the economy heading into the new year.

The flat reading compared with economists' estimates for 0.4 percent growth.

Trader hopes edged up for a more dovish US Federal Reserve with the probability of a one-notch April rate cut up to 36.9 percent from 32.2 percent on Monday, according to CME Group's ⁠FedWatch tool. 

Markets still expect, however, that the central bank will keep rates on hold until June, when US President Donald Trump's ⁠Fed chair nominee, Kevin Warsh, would take charge, if ⁠approved by the US Senate.

Mark Luschini, chief investment strategist at Janney Montgomery Scott, described the disappointing retail data as "bad news is good news," particularly for rate-sensitive industry indexes such as utilities and real estate, which were leading the benchmark's sector gainers.

But the strategist pointed ⁠to caution ahead of the delayed but closely watched non-farm payrolls report, due on Wednesday.

The S&P 500 fell 0.3 percent, to 6,941, the Dow rose 0.1 percent, to 50,188, while the Nasdaq fell 0.6 percent, to 23,102. (Reuters)

title: US retail sales flat in December as consumers cut back
news_content:
US retail sales showed no growth in December, according to delayed government data released on Tuesday, missing analysts' expectations amid heightened scrutiny of the American consumer's appetite – a key driver of the world's biggest economy.

Overall sales were flat on a month-on-month basis at US$735 billion, Commerce Department data showed.

This was down from November's 0.6 percent growth, which saw a boost from the year-end holiday shopping season.

But spending appeared to lose steam, undershooting expectations of economists surveyed by Dow Jones Newswires and The Wall Street Journal who instead expected growth of 0.4 percent.

The Commerce Department's report showed declines across various categories including auto dealers, furniture stores and electronics stores, as well as at restaurants and bars.

Sales at auto dealers slipped by 0.2 percent from the prior month, while those at furniture stores fell by 0.9 percent. Restaurant and bar sales inched down by 0.1 percent.

But consumers continued to spend on essentials like groceries.

"Consumer spending has finally caught up with consumer sentiment, and not in a good way," said Chris Zaccarelli, chief investment officer of Northlight Asset Management.

For months, Zaccarelli said, households continued spending despite worries about rising costs.

But the latest data indicate that consumers are no longer relentlessly stepping up their expenditures, he said.

The question now is whether the shift is a temporary one. This could be the case if the labour market remains resilient and consumers see more cash in their pockets from measures under US President Donald Trump's "One Big Beautiful Bill Act."

Otherwise, "it could be the canary in the coal mine that signals a more serious slowdown," said Zaccarelli.

A consumption slowdown, if it took hold, would hit at the key driver of the US economy, with consumer spending accounting for more than two-thirds of GDP.

As of January, US consumer confidence plunged to its lowest level since 2014 according to The Conference Board.

Economist Oliver Allen of Pantheon Macroeconomics said December's weak retail sales figure and downward revisions to earlier months' numbers "provide clearer signs that consumers are starting to tire."

He noted that the trend for auto sales now looks "flat-to-falling," while a dip in food service sales "rounds off a relatively weak quarter."

Allen expects the pace of spending growth in the second half of 2025 to be unsustainable.

"Growth in real incomes has slowed to a crawl recently, in part due to the weakness in the labour market," he said.

"Households were only able to increase their spending by as much as they did by saving far less."

From a year ago, retail sales were up 2.4 percent in December, also a cooling from November's growth rate. (AFP)

title: 聯合國貿發會議報告指最不發達國家服務業無法創造大規模繁榮
news_content:
聯合國貿易和發展會議發表報告，指出最不發達國家的服務業，雖然正在迅速擴張，但增長仍集中於維持生計的低生產率活動，無法創造大規模繁榮。

報告說最不發達國家正面臨前所未有的就業挑戰，到2050年之前，這些國家每年須為大約1320萬新進入勞動市場的人口創造就業，因為就業已成為制約其發展戰略的關鍵因素。報告又認為雖然旅遊業約佔最不發達國家服務出口的三分之一，但旅遊業收入往往未能顯著轉化為就業增長或經濟轉型。

貿發會議秘書長格林斯潘表示，服務業能有效促進工業化、並提升競爭力，但需要以協調一致的國家戰略及有利的全球環境，作為支撐。



編輯：羅宇光

title: 俄駐華大使稱兩國樹立21世紀大國之間睦鄰友好合作典範
news_content:
俄羅斯駐華大使莫爾古洛夫表示，俄中戰略協作伙伴關係建立近30年來，雙方形成幾乎涵蓋所有可能領域的多層次完整合作格局，樹立21世紀大國之間睦鄰友好合作的典範。

莫爾古洛夫在俄羅斯外交官日，接受新華社書面專訪時又說，俄中經貿合作高速發展，2025年雙邊貿易額再次突破2000億美元大關，中國穩居俄羅斯第一大貿易伙伴國地位，俄羅斯就是中國第五大貿易伙伴國；兩國能源合作穩步推進，俄中東線天然氣管道實現滿負荷輸氣，一批聯合能源項目持續實施，兩國在投資、高科技、農食、交通運輸等領域合作日益深化。



編輯：羅宇光

title: 美財長稱美中關係可以非常有成效　美方不希望與中國脫鉤
news_content:
美國財長貝森特說，美中關係可以非常富有成效，歡迎中國作為競爭對手。

路透社報道，貝森特在巴西聖保羅舉行的一個商界論壇上說，目前美中關係處於一種非常舒適的狀態，雙方會是競爭對手，美方希望公平競爭，不希望與中國脫鉤，但確實需要降低風險。他形容美國正致力在關鍵礦產、半導體及醫藥等戰略產業領域，從中國手上取回主權，雙方始終會是競爭者，他認為競爭能讓對方變得更好，避免停滯不前。報道又指貝森特正準備在未來幾星期，與中國國務院副總理何立峰會晤。

在北京，商務部發言人早前回應有關中美經貿談判的提問時指出，去年中美雙方秉持平等、尊重及互惠精神先後開展五輪經貿磋商，取得一系列積極成果，充分證明雙方透過平等對話磋商能找到解決經貿分歧的辦法，中方願意與美方共同維護好、落實好兩國元首重要共識，用好中美經貿磋商機制，管控分歧、推進合作，促進中美經貿關係穩定、健康、可持續發展。

title: 外交部駐港公署指華爾街日報社論罔顧事實　充斥偏見並嚴重誤導
news_content:
外交部駐港特派員公署新聞發言人去信華爾街日報編輯部，指出華爾街日報在黎智英被判處20年監禁後，立即拋出的社論《黎智英被判處死刑》，明顯是一份早有準備的預製菜，有關社論內容罔顧事實，充斥偏見，嚴重誤導公眾。

發言人說要告訴華爾街日報，在大洋彼岸的無端臆測反映不出香港的真情實景，以標題黨及虛假信息誤導公眾的時代已經結束，又指黎智英是罪有應得，被判20年是大快人心，香港早在1993年就正式廢除死刑，華爾街日報更應專注研究美國法院判下的百年、千年甚至萬年刑期與死刑的關係。

發言人在信中指出，案件審訊在市民、媒體、外國領事官員的密切見證下，全程公開透明，程序無可指責，量刑於法有據，罰當其罪，完全是正義的伸張，又指香港是中國的一部分，一國始終是兩制前提及基礎，任何試圖脫離一國的行為，都是衝撞國家安全底線的犯罪行為，必須承擔相應罪責。



編輯：羅宇光

title: 習近平北京考察期間關切詢問快遞員　稱城市運轉離不開他們
news_content:
中共中央總書記、國家主席、中央軍委主席習近平，在北京考察並看望慰問基層幹部群眾，並向全國各族人民， 以及香港、澳門、台灣同胞、海外僑胞拜年。他於星期一及二在中共中央政治局委員、北京市委書記尹力和市長殷勇陪同下，深入科創園區、養老服務街區、新春市集考察，為基層幹部群眾送上黨中央的關懷與祝福。

習近平昨日上午到北京市西城區新街口街道父母食堂考察，見到在那裡休息的3名快遞人員。習近平關切詢問他們跑快遞多久、工作是否疲累、收入如何、春節會否回家，並讚揚他們付出的辛勞及作出的貢獻點贊。習近平又說他們滿足千家萬戶需求，城市運轉離不開他們，希望他們都能夠生活得好及工作得好。他強調各級黨委和政府一定要關心新就業群體，為他們的生活、工作、學習提供好服務。



編輯：羅宇光

title: 食環署巡查430間出售生蠔食物業處所　重點包括生蠔保存溫度等
news_content:
食物安全中心表示，鑑於近期與進食生蠔相關的食物中毒個案有所上升，食環署在全港各區採取特別行動，加強巡查全港多個持牌食物業處所，以保障食物安全及公眾健康。在過去5天，巡視了全港約430間出售生蠔的食物業處所。

巡查重點包括生蠔的保存溫度、存放在指定雪櫃內的情況、生蠔的供應來源、食物處理人員的個人衛生及食物業處所的衛生情況、查核生蠔的來源文件和衛生證明書，以及抽檢生蠔樣本作檢測等。期間就食物存放、處理和衛生情況作出即時建議。食環署表示，巡查會繼續進行，確保持牌、持證人或相關負責人遵守有關牌照或許可證條件，並符合法例訂明的衛生標準。

發言人說，本月有10宗食物中毒個案所涉人士，曾進食由韓國Seojun Mulsan Co., Ltd.供應的生蠔；以及11宗個案曾進食由供應商傑頓國際食品及88投資控股有限公司食物製造工場供應的生蠔。中心較早前已指示停售。至於其餘個案，牽涉多款不同國家的生蠔，調查仍然繼續。



編輯：任順熙

title: 澳門立法會一般性一致通過維護國安委法案
news_content:
澳門立法會以全票32票一般性通過《澳門特區維護國家安全委員會》法案。

保安司司長陳子勁下午在立法會表示，今次立法的目的是明確國安委的法律定位，彰顯國安委在維護國家安全事務上的嚴肅性和權威性。今次立法不但可優化原有制度的規定，例如更明確、精準和有效規範國安委的性質、職責、職權、組成及運作等，務求令國安委的運作更符合澳門社會現實需要。

他說，法案彌補了例如為全面配合國安委行使法定職能，和進一步加強涉及國家安全利益的審查工作，以更有效、精準的方式防範和遏止外來干涉，確保國家安全利益不受損害。

按照草案的細則條文，未來國安委的委員會囊括特區政府五個範疇的司長在內，而新法亦會取消原有的國安委辦公室和撤銷副主席的職位，突顯國安委主席是澳門特區國家安全第一負責人的地位與角色。

而屬於中央事權的國家安全，在法案中會進一步明確和細化中央人民政府在國安委中所設立的國家安全事務顧問及國家安全技術顧問，在澳門特區維護國家安全事務上的職責。

保安司司長是當然兼任未來會取代原國安委執行及輔助部門的秘書處秘書。國安委會以保密制度、開支特別制度和人員基本制度等形式運作。而澳門的司法聽證和訴訟代理人，如果參與涉及國家安全事宜的訴訟程序時，必須事先取得特別許可。

有關法案的細則條文，會再由立法會舉行大會逐一討論表決。



編輯：任順熙

title: Unionist, employers differ over minimum wage rise
news_content:
Business and unionist representatives expressed different views towards an increase in the city's minimum wage, with one side describing it as reasonable and the other saying it fails to catch up with price hikes.

The Minimum Wage Commission has recommended an increase of 2.3 percent, or HK$1, to the Statutory Minimum Wage starting from May 1.

Unionist lawmaker Lam Chun-sing said the increase is not enough for some workers as the calculation only takes into account the overall inflation rate.

Lam, who also chairs Federation of Hong Kong and Kowloon Labour Unions, said workers who have to travel far for work may not be able to cover their expenses. 

"Transportation cost sometimes increase by more than 3 percent to 4 percent. For those who need to travel to different district to work and with high transportation cost, they may think that this time the increase is not enough, although [the raise] considered overall inflation levels," he said. 

Lam called on the government to review its calculation formula to allow grassroot workers to share the fruit from economic development rather than merely maintaining their purchasing power.

Meanwhile, Irons Sze, an employer representative of the Labour Advisory Board and permanent honorary president of the Chinese Manufacturers' Association, described the minimum wage increase as "moderate". 

He said the raise would be able to balance hiring costs and livelihood needs of workers.

Danny Lau, honorary chairman of the Small and Medium Enterprises Association, said the raise is reasonable and has struck a balance between the current business environment and maintaining workers' purchasing power under inflation.

title: 美國去年12月零售銷售按月零增長遜預期　上季薪酬升幅放慢
news_content:
美國去年12月零售銷售按月零增長，市場原先預期會增長0.4%。

期內，扣除汽車的零售銷售同樣零增長，差過預期。 

另外，美國上季就業成本指數按季升0.7%，略低於預期；薪酬按季增長0.7%，較去年第3季放慢0.1個百分點。



編輯：羅煒皓

title: 內塔尼亞胡啟程訪美　預告將與特朗普討論美伊談判
news_content:
以色列總理內塔尼亞胡啟程前往美國，預計當地時間星期三與美國總統特朗普會面。

內塔尼亞胡啟程前表示，今次與特朗普的會談，首要議題是與伊朗的談判，也會討論加沙以及中東地區局勢。內塔尼亞胡表示，將向特朗普闡述以方對美伊談判原則的看法，認為這些基本原則，對以色列、以至世界上任何希望中東地區和平安全的國家，都至關重要。

伊朗外交部發言人巴加埃，同日批評以色列在伊美談判中扮演破壞性角色。他說，伊朗的談判對象是美國，美國應該獨立於外部壓力行事，尤其是不應該受到以色列的影響。



編輯：盧曉珊

title: 食環署拒絶土瓜灣「金寶肉食公司」解封要求　指衛生狀況未達標
news_content:
食環署表示，土瓜灣「金寶肉食公司」因衛生狀況不佳和鼠患嚴重，上月被勒令暫時封閉，上星期五曾提出解封要求，但由於店內的衞生狀況及滅鼠措施仍未達標，所以署方已拒絕解封要求，封閉令仍然生效。

署方表示，高度重視食物安全和環境衞生，對於有新鮮糧食店漠視法規，不當處理豬隻屠體，導致店內鼠患嚴重，影響市民健康的情況絕不容忍。署方未來會加強在各區採取深宵突擊行動，若發現有新鮮糧食店不當處理豬隻屠體導致鼠患，會毫不猶疑向店鋪發出即時封閉令及取消其牌照，以保障市民健康。

食環署表示，已於本月初在全港各區採取特別行動，加強巡查超過250間持牌新鮮糧食店，嚴厲打擊增加鼠患風險的違規情況，以保障食物安全和公眾健康，在特別行動中，署方人員就違規情況向相關新鮮糧食店共作出101次口頭警告或勸喻，以及提出47宗檢控。



編輯：任順熙

title: 人行：實施適度寬鬆貨幣政策　將做強國內大循環放到更突出位置
news_content:
人民銀行發布第4季度貨幣政策執行報告，強調下階段要繼續實施好適度寬鬆的貨幣政策，將促進經濟穩定增長、物價合理回升作爲貨幣政策的重要考量，靈活高效運用降準、減息等多種政策工具，保持流動性充裕和社會融資條件相對寬鬆，引導金融總量合理增長、信貸均衡投放，使社會融資規模、貨幣供應量增長同經濟增長、價格總水平預期目標匹配。 

報告又指，世界經濟增長動力不足，貿易壁壘增多，通脹走勢和貨幣政策調整存在不確定性，雖然內地經濟總體運行平穩，但仍存在「供強需弱」等挑戰。

人行強調，要將做強國內大循環放到更突出的位置，增強宏觀政策前瞻性、針對性和協同性，加強對擴大內需、科技創新、中小微企等重點領域的金融支持，保持匯率彈性，加強預期引導，防範匯率超調風險，保持人民幣在合理均衡水平上基本穩定。

此外，報告指出，要完善市場化利率形成傳導機制，降低銀行負債成本，促進社會綜合融資成本低位運行；完善宏觀審慎和金融穩定管理工具箱，維護金融市場穩定，堅決守住不發生系統性金融風險的底線。




編輯：羅煒皓

title: 三名司長稱白皮書對維護國家安全工作具指導意義
news_content:
國務院新聞辦公室發布《「一國兩制」下香港維護國家安全的實踐》白皮書，形容《香港國安法》出台「一法安香江」，完善選舉制度，守牢特區管治權，特區亦歷史性完成基本法第23條立法等。

政務司司長陳國基表示，白皮書深入闡述中央政府對香港維護國家安全的原則立場，系統總結香港維護國家安全的經驗啓示，對香港特區全面準確、堅定不移地貫徹「一國兩制」方針，進一步做好維護國家安全工作，統籌好高水平安全以保障高質量發展，開創更加美好的未來，具有重大的啓示和指導意義。他在社交專頁表示，未來必須持續努力，在堅定維護國家安全的同時，完善行政主導治理體系，通過改革提升治理效能，通過創新激發發展動能，通過發展增進民生福祉，特別是要把握「十五五」規劃的宏大機遇，加快粵港澳大灣區建設步伐，在融入和服務國家發展大局中，共建香港更繁榮、更美好的家園。

律政司司長林定國表示，白皮書以歷史觀、按時序詳述和剖析過去遇到的挑戰、應對的理念和策略以及成果，進而重申立場和表達對香港的要求和期望。他在社交專頁表示，充分理解白皮書，能更有信心、更有理有節講好香港的維護國家安全故事，亦更全面準確履行維護國家安全的責任。

財政司司長陳茂波表示，白皮書闡述香港在「一國兩制」實踐新階段，以高水平安全護航「一國兩制」事業高質量發展的重點方向，為未來的工作提供明確指導。他表示，在推動香港發展時，需要時刻以國家安全的高度和大局宏觀的視野審視問題，以總體國家安全觀為指導，確保「一國兩制」實踐行穩致遠，以及香港經濟的可持續發展。



編輯：任順熙

title: 國安處截至去年底拘385人　周一鳴稱對危害國家安全者絶不手軟
news_content:
警務處處長周一鳴表示，自《香港國安法》和《維護國家安全條例》生效後，截至去年底，國安處拘捕385人，超過一半已被檢控。他透露，至去年底，國安處舉報熱線共收到110萬個信息，平均每天有590個，強調警方對心懷不軌、危害國家安全的人，會堅決依法採取一切管用措施，執法到底，絕不手軟。

周一鳴在立法會一個委員會會議上，被問及黎智英案判刑時表示，法庭判詞有交代其犯罪行為嚴重性，認為有人質疑案件屬政治檢控是絕不公平。

本港去年的罪案數字按年下跌5.9%、至89137宗。周一鳴透露，整體破案率30.3%，撇除詐騙案的破案率為49.3%。

他表示，去年全年的嚴重毒品罪行案件按年升一成半，有1281宗，涉及依托咪酯的案件佔三成，已成為整體及青少年最常吸食的毒品。自依托咪酯去年2月被列為毒品，截至去年底，警方錄得911宗涉及依托咪酯的案件，共拘捕1134人，包括205名青少年。他表示，針對依托咪酯的案件，與律政司希望商討訂立量刑指引，以增加阻嚇性。

周一鳴表示，「銳眼計劃」至去年底已成功協助偵破763宗案件，共拘捕1280人。

title: Scams see first drop since 2019: police chief
news_content:
Police commissioner Joe Chow said deception cases in Hong Kong dropped last year for the first time since 2019.

The number of cases stood at 43,212, down 2.9 percent from 2024.

Chow also said the total number of crime cases in 2025 topped 89,000, a decrease of 5.9 percent year on year.

The police chief told lawmakers that losses in deception cases reached HK$8.1 billion last year.

About a third of the cases were related to online transactions, Chow said, and there was a significant rise in ticket scams following the opening of the Kai Tak Sports Park.

Investment-related scams, meanwhile, jumped 30 percent last year, involving nearly HK$3.6 billion, up 60 percent from 2024.

Chow said police are focusing their prevention and promotion efforts on investment scams on the internet.

"It's not just mainland students [falling victim to scams]. For the general public, the total amount of money lost due to online investment scams was the most among all kinds of deception cases," he said during a Legco security panel meeting.

The police chief also said there were more than 8,800 cases of violent crime, which fell by nearly 16 percent from 2024.

The most serious crimes recorded a drop, such as rape, wounding and triad-related cases, but murder and serious drugs cases went up.

On national security cases, Chow said since the National Security Law took effect in 2020, officers had arrested 385 people until the end of last year, with more than half of them prosecuted.

He said the force will continue to resolutely enforce the law and take measures against those who attempt to endanger national security.

title: 大灣區跨境直通救護車首次北向轉運演練　雙向轉運冀首季實施
news_content:
特區政府聯同廣東省和深圳市政府就「大灣區跨境直通救護車試行計劃」進行首次北向轉運演練，測試在模擬載送病人的情況下的救護車，跨境由伊利沙伯醫院至港大深圳醫院的行車路線及出入境安排。

演練期間深方救護車先從港大深圳醫院出發，經深圳灣口岸前往香港伊利沙伯醫院接載病人，再經同一口岸將病人轉運至港大深圳醫院接受治療，測試過程暢順。

醫務衞生局局長盧寵茂表示，粵港兩地政府部門順利進行由香港至深圳的首次北向轉運演練，為擴展試行計劃至雙向轉運安排奠下基礎，特區政府會繼續與相關內地部門保持緊密溝通和合作，期望可於今年第一季內正式實施跨境直通救護車雙向轉運。

試行計劃自啓動以來，至今已有23名病人由深圳、珠海、南沙和澳門的指定派送醫院，即港大深圳醫院、珠海市人民醫院、中山大學附屬第一醫院南沙院區和澳門仁伯爵綜合醫院，轉運到香港指定公立醫院接受治療。



編輯：任順熙

title: 議員稱最低工資「一年一檢」助工友追上通脹　僱主代表稱加幅溫和
news_content:
最低工資委員會按法定最低工資「一年一檢」新機制，建議由現行每小時42.1元調升至43.1元，如獲立法會通過，最快會5月1日實施。

勞聯主席、立法會議員林振昇認為，「一年一檢」新機制可以避免基層工友連續數年無人工加的情況，有助基層工友的購買力追上通脹。他說，考慮到交通開支升幅較大，對跨區上班的工友加幅未必足夠，建議日後檢討時可考慮調整方程式，與基層工友分享更多經濟成果。

香港中小型企業聯合會永遠榮譽主席劉達邦形容，加幅溫和合理，平衡到目前營商環境下商家的情況，並維持僱員在通貨膨脹下的消費力。

勞顧會僱主代表、香港中華廠商聯合會永遠名譽會長施榮懷預計，約有1萬8千至1萬9千人受惠於是次加幅。他形容，新機制下有明確公式，方便商家預算，有助減少勞資雙方爭議，亦認為這次增幅溫和，能平衡僱主的成本壓力及僱員的生活需要。而目前保安清潔等行業面對勞工短缺問題，估計調整最低工資亦較難請人，建議政府不時檢視輸入勞工的情況及相關計劃。



編輯：任順熙

title: 消防將引入配備通訊設備新呼吸器　推展社區及樓宇應急先鋒計劃
news_content:
保安局建議，把消防處負責新界南總區的助理處長職位，由有時限編外職位轉為常額職位。保安局局長鄧炳強表示，隨著新界南人口持續增長、重大基建發展、郊野和極端天氣、救援需求上升等，認為有需要將該職位轉為常額。

鄧炳強在立法會一個委員會會議上表示，過去5年，新界兩個總區人口持續增長，加上各大型基建和發展項目相繼落成，兩個總區在人手編制、服務範圍和事故處理規模，已大致與港島和九龍總區看齊。過去3年，兩個新界總區的助理處長出動指揮行動達29次，較港島和九龍總區合計還要多。

鄧炳強提到在救火工作上要與時並進，消防處快將引入配備通訊設備的新呼吸器，而呼吸器氣樽可隨時更換，亦可與他人分享。消防處未來亦會測試新型迷你熱能顯像器，可在高溫火場環境中觀察到火源。另外，亦會引用無人機作夜間照明及攝影，因應現時要消防員調運器材上樓滅火，處方計劃利用大型無人機將工具吊運到較高樓層。

他表示，計劃推展18區社區應急先鋒及樓宇應急先鋒計劃，透過與各區防火會合作，以訓練社區人士學習簡單急救，以及向樓宇管理員及業主等，宣傳樓宇不應積存垃圾或甚麼地方不能上鎖等，以免出現當局巡查後再出現同類問題。他強調檢控並非最終目的，而是要加強公眾警覺性。

title: 'Wealth shifting to HK as family office numbers surge'
news_content:
Accounting giant Deloitte said on Tuesday a majority of the single-family offices (SFOs) operating in Hong Kong were looking to increase their investments here.

According to Deloitte, the city was home to 3,384 SFOs at the end of 2025, an increase of 25 percent over two years.

A study by the firm found that SFOs contributed around HK$12.6 billion to the city's economy each year through operating expenditure alone, while employing more than 10,000 full-time professionals.

SFOs are private dedicated entities serving one wealthy individual or family by managing their investments, succession planning and philanthropic activities.

Deloitte Private's Hong Kong leader Anthony Lau noted that while the most of the new SFOs are from the mainland and Hong Kong, there was also interest from affluent regions around the world.

"Because of the various initiatives from the government, as well as its Go Global initiative, we also see that there are high-net-worth individuals coming from Europe, the rest of Asia-Pacific, US and Middle East to Hong Kong to set up single family offices as well," he said.

Roy Phan, Deloitte China Hong Kong international tax partner, noted that a key theme among the SFOs is that they are refocusing on Hong Kong amid global financial market uncertainties.

While 19 percent of SFOs surveyed said they planned to cut exposure to the US, 60 percent said they would increase exposure in the SAR in the coming three years, partly due to the city's booming stock and initial public offering market.

And about 26 percent aimed to increase exposure to the mainland thanks to the rise of the country's tech sector.

"Basically, AI and data science industry stands out as 60 percent of respondents say they intend to invest into this industry," Phan said.

"And 40 percent of the respondents from the SFOs indicate that they would increase their investments into three other sectors, including life and health technology, fintech, and the advanced manufacturing and new energy sectors." 

In a statement, Secretary for Financial Services and the Treasury Christopher Hui said the family office industry and the asset management sectors were undergoing a "rapid evolution", with a greater focus on sustainable growth, inter-generational legacy, and positive impact.

"Under the 'One Country, Two Systems' framework, Hong Kong, with its advantages of being backed by the motherland and connected to the world, provides a favourable environment which is both predictable and has high potential for family offices to grow," he said.

Hui added that the government would continue to drive growth in the sector through the introduction of multiple measures, including tax benefits and implementation of the New Capital Investment Entrant Scheme.

The study, commissioned by government promotion arm InvestHK, includes surveys with 136 market participants across the city's family office industry, including 85 SFOs and 36 multi-family offices, between October and December.

集團上季毛利率19.2%，按年跌3.4個百分點。

中芯去年盈利近6.9億美元，按年升39%，收入升逾16%至近93.3億美元。

title: 本港去年整體罪案按年跌5.9%　詐騙案跌2.9%惟總數仍高企
news_content:
警方表示，本港去年共錄得整體罪案數字按年下跌5.9%、至89137宗。其中暴力罪案下跌15.9%、至8823宗。行劫、爆竊、強姦等的大部分主要罪案都錄得下跌，至於兇殺案、嚴重毒品就有所上升。

詐騙案數字去年繼續高企，但按年微跌2.9%、至43212宗，是2019年起詐騙案逐漸上升後首次下跌。損失金額按年跌11.3%至81億元。詐騙案佔整體罪案近半數，當中網上購物騙案佔三成。自啟德體育園去年開幕後，演唱會門票網購騙案明顯增加，按年升六成、至2805宗。至於網上投資騙案升三成、至5135宗，涉款升六成、至35.8億元，網上投資騙案佔整體騙案約12%，但損失金額佔整體四成四。

警務處處長周一鳴在立法會一個委員會會議表示，針對電話騙案，警方與通訊辦及業界已成立工作小組研究並實施不同措施，商務及經濟發展局會在年內提交降低電話卡數目上限，以及訂立新罪行，以打擊不當使用電話卡。

另外，周一鳴表示，內地學生在電騙中的損失金額遠比本地學生高，因此去年就預防內地生成為騙案受害人方面作大量宣傳教育工作，經過一年努力情況有改善，案件數字及損失金額分別跌一成及一成七。不過，內地生涉及投資騙案的案件數字及損失金額有所急升，加上對市民而言，網上投資騙案的總損失金額亦是各類騙案中最高，今年會將重點宣傳項目轉向投資騙案。他表示，長者的受騙數字亦有上升，會維持以長者作為今年的重點宣傳對象。



編輯：任順熙

title: 中海外近18.1億元投得牛頭角彩霞道地皮

title: 德勤：本港家辦數目增長趨勢有望持續
news_content:
本港過去兩年單一家族辦公室增加約680間。受投資推廣署委託進行研究的德勤指出，來自內地的家辦佔比仍然較多，同時亦有亞洲及中東的家辦落戶香港，財富來源主要集中於金融、工業及房地產。

德勤民營企業與私人客戶服務香港主管合夥人劉明揚認為，家辦數目仍未「封頂」，增長趨勢有望持續，IPO、資產管理等資本市場發展蓬勃，港股1月日均成交達2700億元，較去年同期增長約九成，同時政府針對家辦的稅務優惠與時並進，相信都能吸引更多高淨值人士來港成立家辦。

劉明揚指出，在新加坡成立家辦過去需要經過12至18個月政府審批，雖然當地已出台措施縮短審批時間至3個月，但對比香港毋須政府審批，香港明顯更具優勢。香港銀行嚴謹的KYC（認識你的客戶）程序和專業服務機構多重把關，也能有效防止洗錢風險。 

財經事務及庫務局計劃今年上半年提交立法建議，擴展有關基金及單一家辦的優惠稅制合資格投資範圍，涵蓋例如貴金屬、貸款及私募債權投資和數字資產。德勤中國國際稅收服務合夥人潘宗杰指出，超過一半受訪家辦目前持有數字資產，私募股權、貴金屬投資同樣突出。未來數字資產仍是較受關注的另類投資方向，四成受訪者表示將增配數字資產，僅次於公開市場股票。 

潘宗杰又說，家辦對慈善活動需求同樣殷切，建議政府考慮取消慈善捐款扣稅上限，同時亦應重新檢視《稅務條例》第88條下免稅慈善團體定義，以鼓勵更多家辦、高淨值人士捐款及成立慈善信託。



編輯：宋家樑

title: Woman arrested for suspected murder of husband
news_content:
Police on Tuesday said a 51-year-old woman was arrested in Tuen Mun on suspicion of murdering her 63-year-old husband.

Officers responded to a report at 6.41pm on Monday of an unconscious man inside a house in Tseng Tau Chung Tsuen. 

They found the man with severe head injuries and he was pronounced dead at the scene.

Also present were the man's wife and their 24-year-old daughter, a student who made the emergency call. 

The wife reported feeling unwell - experiencing dizziness and vomiting - and was taken by officers to Tuen Mun Hospital for treatment.

Chief Inspector Chong Yuen-na said the couple had lived at the address for more than 20 years. 

She said the deceased worked was a cleaner, while his wife was unemployed. 

"Their long-term relationship was reportedly very strained. They were also facing severe economic difficulties, which led to frequent disputes," Chong said. 

Police believe the alleged attack occurred in the early hours of Monday morning, with the daughter reporting she found her father lying on a bed with head wounds when she returned from her studies at around 6pm.

Investigators recovered a potential murder weapon at the scene - a stainless steel cooking pot roughly 19 centimetres in diameter. 

The exact cause of the man's death awaits further examination.

title: 在岸人民幣高收155點子　再創33個月新高
news_content:
在岸人民幣再創33個月新高，收市報6.9129兌1美元，較上日收市升155點子。中間價亦升至33個月高位，但較市場預測偏弱逾320點子，反映監管部門加碼過濾單邊預期。

市場人士表示，在美國公布非農就業數據前，美元大幅走弱，加上農曆新年假期前結匯格局延續，風險情緒升溫，估計短線延續小幅上升走勢。

title: 電盈去年虧損收窄近16%　免費電視及相關收益跌2%
news_content:
電訊盈科去年虧損2.53億元，按年收窄近16%。派末期息每股28.48仙，全年派38.25仙。

期內，收益按年升約7%至402.5億元，未計流動通訊產品銷售的香港電訊收益升3%至330.2億元；OTT業務收益升5%至25.8億元；免費電視及相關業務收益跌約2%至10.3億元。

去年Viu淨增加130萬名付費用戶，總數達1680萬戶，訂購收益增長13%。



編輯：李意琴

title: Muzzles, diapers ruled out for dog restaurants
news_content:
Secretary for Environment and Ecology Tse Chin-wan said muzzles and diapers would not be required to be clad on dogs once their owners were allowed to bring them into designated restaurants as early as the middle of this year. 

The SAR administration is planning to allow up to 1,000 eateries to add a dog-admission endorsement to their existing food business licence in the first phase of its easing of a ban on such entries. 

Tse was responding to a question at a Legislative Council panel meeting by Christine Fong on whether his bureau would make diapers and muzzles mandatory to reduce the likelihood of disputes arising. 

He said a requirement that dogs had to be put on a leash no longer than 1.5 metres took into account safety considerations as well as the pets' activity needs. 

"It depends on the dog's health condition when it comes to diapers. Some dogs may need it, but generally speaking we do not think there is a need to make it mandatory, Tse said. 

"It may cause discomfort to dogs that do not need diapers, so we will leave it for dog owners to decide depending on their pet's situation. 

"As for muzzles, we think having the dogs on leashes balances their need for an area to move in with overall safety in the current phase. 

"We will look into the situation when the policy is implemented to determine whether stricter requirements are needed."

Tse also stressed that dog owners were accountable for their pet's behaviour no matter where they were, while restaurants had to bear responsibility for hygiene conditions inside their premises. 

Lawmaker Judy Chan asked if the government would consider setting a quota for the number of restaurants within a district that would be able to get the permit as a way to ensure fairness. 

In response, Food and Environmental Hygiene Department director Donald Ng said there would be a drawing of lots to allocate permits if applications exceeded the number of permits to be given out and that districts with more restaurants hoping to welcome dogs would eventually receive more permits under the mechanism.

title: 謝展寰：狗隻獲准入食肆原則是不可觸及餐桌　狗主有責任約束
news_content:
政府計劃修例容許狗隻進入獲批准食肆，首階段擬設約500至1000個名額。環境及生態局局長謝展寰在立法會一個委員會表示，看到很多餐廳表示有興趣，亦有部分處於觀望，預料首階段未必有很多申請，重申當局每6個月會發出一次申請邀請。當局預計最快6月批出首輪申請，半年後再檢討。

委員會副主席楊永杰關注，每人每次可帶同多少隻狗隻進入獲批餐廳。食物環境衞生署署長吳文傑說，因應食肆規模不同，目前不會有硬性要求，但將來制定相關發牌條件時，會有良好作業指引，例如由餐廳考慮是否要限制狗隻數目等。

政府提出，為保障食物衛生，食環署會施加牌照條件確保明確區分人與狗的食物及餐具，亦不得容許狗隻上餐桌。民建聯何俊賢建議，政府制定相關指引時要詳細列明要求，例如若不讓狗隻上桌，是否意指不讓全隻狗上桌、而狗隻將前肢放上桌又是否可接受等。謝展寰回應，原則是狗隻不可觸及餐桌，狗主是有責任約束狗隻。

民建聯洪錦鉉關注，當局會否要求食肆購買相關責任保險，以便釐清一旦狗隻在餐廳內咬人等責任。謝展寰重申，約束狗隻行為屬狗主責任，不會強制食肆購買相關保險；當局已提出，規定需以長度不超過1.5米的牽引帶控制進入餐廳的狗隻。

title: 外交部強調香港法治不容撼動　任何外國無權說三道四
news_content:
在北京，外交部批評個別國家和機構，借香港特區司法案件惡意抹黑香港、詆毀香港法治、干涉中國內政，中方對此堅決反對，已向有關國家和機構提出嚴正交涉。

針對美國、英國、澳洲、歐盟等，就黎智英案發表聲明，外交部發言人林劍說，黎智英是一系列重大反中亂港事件的主要策劃者和參與者，危害國家安全犯罪事實清楚、罪證確鑿。香港特區司法機關依據事實和法律作出裁決，合法正當、不容置喙。

林劍強調，香港事務純屬中國內政，香港法治不容撼動，任何外國無權說三道四。中國政府維護國家主權、安全、發展利益的決心堅定不移，貫徹「一國兩制」方針的決心堅定不移，一切破壞香港由治及興進程、妄想亂港遏華的圖謀都絕不可能得逞。

林劍說，中方敦促有關方面尊重中國主權，恪守國際法原則和國際關係基本準則，立即停止以任何方式插手香港事務、干涉中國內政。



編輯：盧曉珊

title: 屯門井頭中村男子死亡妻子被捕　警稱兩人長期關係緊張常有爭拗
李慧琼：白皮書明確香港新時代使命　以高水平安全護航高質量發展
news_content:
全國人大常委、立法會主席李慧琼表示，堅定支持國務院新聞辦公室發布的《「一國兩制」下香港維護國家安全的實踐》白皮書，認為這份文件不僅是對香港維護國家安全成績的全面總結，更是為未來高水平安全發展指明方向。白皮書以事實為依據、以理據為支撐，系統闡述中央政府與特區共同維護國家安全的歷程與成果，正本清源，振奮信心，正合其時。

李慧琼在社交專頁表示，白皮書指出，維護國家安全是「一國兩制」方針的最高原則，也是特區的憲制責任。這份文件明確香港在新時代的使命——以高水平安全護航高質量發展。這對立法機關而言，是嚴肅而神聖的責任，會堅定支持行政長官的領導，依法配合行政、司法機關，推動完善相關法律制度及執行機制，確保國家安全不受任何威脅。

她又說，事實證明，安全帶來穩定，穩定帶來信心，信心帶來發展。今天的香港社會秩序穩定、經濟復甦強勁、營商信心提升，這是中央大力支持與港人共同努力的成果。未來將把握國家發展機遇，積極融入國家大局，讓「一國兩制」在新征程上行穩致遠。香港必將在安全、繁榮與法治的基礎上，邁向長治久安的新篇章。



編輯：任順熙

title: 林定國：行政、立法、司法機關各有分工　同唱一台戲
news_content:
律政司司長林定國表示，雖然行政主導這四個字沒有出現在《基本法》中，但這是《基本法》第四章訂下有關香港特區政治體制最精準的表述和總結。他說，準確落實行政主導，就是依法辦事。

林定國出席一個研討會致辭時說，在行政主導下，就行政和立法關係，行政處於主動和主導地位，例如政府擁有絕大部分立法的創議權，涉及公共開支、政治體制及政府運作方面的法律草案，只能由政府提出。不過，林定國說，不否認行政與立法之間存在制衡關係，《基本法》第64條便說明特區政府必須對立法會負責，執行立法會通過並已生效的法例，定期向立法會作《施政報告》，答覆立法會議員的質詢，徵稅和公共開支需經立法會批准。

林定國指出，行政主導的重點在於雖然行政、立法、司法機關各有分工，但根本目的是一樣，就是為了廣大市民的根本福祉和香港的整體利益，這就是「同唱一台戲」。一齣高水平、高票房的好戲，需要有不同演員，各自做好自己的角色，與其他演員建立良好的互動和默契，同心合力講好故事。他認為我們要合力講好的故事有一個簡單的名字，就是「美好的香港」。



編輯：任順熙

title: 電視廣播料去年業績扭虧為盈　廣告收入按年錄得雙位數升幅
news_content:
電視廣播發盈喜，預期去年業績扭虧為盈，轉賺逾5000萬元，前年則蝕逾4.9億元；除息、稅、折舊及攤銷前盈利（EBITDA）按年升近19%至3.5億元。

公司指，受惠劇集帶動，上季香港地面免費頻道廣告收入持續增長，去年廣告收入按年錄得雙位數升幅；客戶亦購買更多串流服務及其他數字資產廣告套餐，帶動上季數碼廣告收入錄得強勁雙位數增長。

公司預計3月底刊發去年度業績。



編輯：宋家樑

title: 機場抵港層二級火救熄　一度疏散約30人
news_content:
機場發生二級火警，一度需要疏散約30人。

下午約3時，現場是機場中場客運廊抵港層、近212號閘口，有機房懷疑起火冒煙，職員報警求助。消防員接報到場，列作二級火警，出動兩隊煙帽隊及兩條喉灌救，到下午4時01分將火救熄。

title: HK stocks up as mainland trades thin ahead of holiday
news_content:
Mainland ‍stocks closed slightly higher on Tuesday, with gains in the communications sector outweighing losses in property shares, as trading gradually thinned ahead of the long Lunar New Year holiday.

In Hong Kong, the benchmark Hang Seng Index ended up almost 156 points, or 0.58 percent, at 27,183. The China enterprises index was up 72 points, or 0.81 percent, at 9,242 while the tech index was up 33 points, or 0.62 percent, at 5,451.

The benchmark Shanghai Composite Index ended up just over five points, or 0.13 percent, at 4,128.

The Shenzhen Component Index closed just over two points, or 0.02 percent, higher at 14,210 while the ChiNext Index, tracking China's Nasdaq-style board of growth enterprises, lost 12 points, or 0.37 percent, to close at 3,320.

The combined turnover of the Shanghai and Shenzhen indexes amounted to nearly 2.11 trillion yuan, down from 2.25 trillion yuan on Monday.

China's onshore media stocks surged on excitement over ByteDance's latest AI video-generation model, with the CSI media sub-index closing up 4.2 percent and the CSI film and TV sub-index surging 9.3 percent.

Meanwhile, property shares fell, with ‍the CSI real estate sub-index losing about 2 percent.

"We sense a notable pick-up ⁠in interest in the chemicals sectors and in the A-share semi-cap equipment sector, which ‍is benefiting from the domestic AI upcycle," said James Wang, head of China strategy at UBS Investment Bank Research.

Trading is expected to be thin this week ahead of the Lunar New Year holiday, which is the biggest festival in China. The week-long holiday ‌runs from February 15 to 23 this year.

President Xi Jinping on Monday stressed self-reliance and strength in science and technology, hailing it as the "key" in building China into a great modern socialist country, Xinhua news agency reported.

Separately, investors will watch upcoming economic data, including China's January credit lending figures and US employment and consumer price reports, for possible market impact. (Reuters & Xinhua)

title: 港股高收155點　汽車及醫藥股造好　渣打低收約2%
news_content:
港股連升兩日，但未能企穩27300點水平。恒生指數早段最多升370點，觸及27397點，創逾1星期新高，收報27183點，升155點，升幅約0.6%，主板成交額減至2340億元。

主要分類指數個別發展，地產及公用事業指數偏軟，金融及科技指數上升。科指升0.6%，收報5451點。

ATMXJ個別發展，阿里巴巴及京東集團升近2%，騰訊及美團跌近2%或以上。

渣打午後急挫逾6%，收市仍跌約2%，杜智高接受外部工作機會，即時卸任渣打執行董事及財務總監。

汽車、醫藥、資源股造好，信達生物及石藥升近5%或以上，是表現最好兩隻藍籌股。三桶油升近2%至近3%。

泡泡瑪特再升約5%，連升7個交易日。

兩隻新股掛牌，樂欣戶外比招股價升1倍收市，愛芯元智收市無起跌。



編輯：羅煒皓

title: Statutory minimum wage to rise to HK$43.10
news_content:
The statutory minimum wage is set to rise by a dollar to HK$43.10.

This came as the Executive Council adopted the recommendation of the Minimum Wage Commisson to raise the current rate of HK$42.10 by 2.38 percent, according to a statement on Tuesday.

The revised rate will come into force on May 1 if the Legislative Council gives the green light.

The government will publish the Minimum Wage Ordinance (Amendment of Schedule 3) Notice 2026 in the Gazette on February 20, before it is tabled in Legco on February 25.

"The recommendation of the Minimum Wage Commission is in line with the policy objectives of the statutory minimum wage to maintain an appropriate balance between forestalling excessively low wages and minimising the loss of low-paid jobs, while giving due regard to sustaining Hong Kong's economic growth and competitiveness," Secretary for Labour and Welfare Chris Sun said in the statement.

In response, the commission said it was delighted to learn that the council had accepted its recommendation and hoped lawmakers would approve the new minimum wage.

title: 測量師學會成立樓宇維修工作組　改善整體市場生態防範維修陷阱
news_content:
香港測量師學會表示，為回應社會對樓宇安全的高度關注，成立跨測量專業組別的「樓宇維修工作組」，檢視市場運作、監管及法規，提出具體優化建議以改善整體市場生態，防範維修陷阱，提升及確保工程標準。

測量師學會表示，工作組將通過收集市場數據、分析媒體報道，並廣泛邀請業主代表、物管及承建商行業組織、政府部門等持份者訪談，梳理長期存在問題、業主面對困難及各界意見。

工作組計劃4個月內完成研究及檢視工作，目標今年5月完成分析，6月向社會及政府提交總結建議，期望可推動建立更完善、透明、具支援性的樓宇維修市場制度。

針對今年3月起生效的《簡樸房條例》，測量師學會表示，樂見該認證制度有助提升不適切居所的整體質素。為確保條例平穩落實，建議政府考慮利用過渡性房屋暫時安置受影響的劏房家庭，並設立約一年時限，協助他們順利適應。



編輯：任順熙

title: 陳國基冀帶領社會逐步走出火災傷痛　重建讓人安心安居家園
news_content:
政務司司長陳國基表示，面對現今變幻不定的全球政經局勢，社會各界包括商界，只要堅守「一國兩制」的初心，以愛國愛港的核心價值，必定能夠化解挑戰，捉緊機遇，創造更光輝的未來。

陳國基在一個頒獎典禮致辭時表示，去年香港經歷大埔宏福苑火災，刺痛每一位香港市民的心，面對災情，政府迅速行動，社會各界團結互助，全力支援受影響居民，善後和調查等工作亦已相繼進行，必定會團結一致，帶領社會逐步走出傷痛，重建讓人安心、安居、安全的家園。

title: Ngong Ping 360 eyes more tourists beyond GBA
news_content:
Ngong Ping 360 managing director James Tung on Tuesday said he hoped the cable car attraction would draw more overnight tourists during the upcoming Chinese New Year holiday.

This came as the attraction saw a rise in both average daily visits and per capita spending in 2025. 

Tung said the cable cars stopped running for more days last year compared to 2024 due to extreme weather conditions.

However, it received an average of 4,850 guests per day last year – higher than the 4,843 daily visits in 2024, he said.

Tung added that the overall per capita spending at Ngong Ping 360 also grew by 4.5 percent, with a 1.5 percent rise in spending on cable car services and over 20 percent for other spending.

He said the company has visited various mainland cities such as Beijing and Shanghai in a bid to further attract visitors beyond the Greater Bay Area.

Festive activities and installations are also planned to attract tourists during the Chinese New Year holiday, he said.

"What we are trying to do is to showcase the best of Hong Kong, how Hong Kong celebrates Chinese New Year, which is, in my own opinion, second to none comparing to different cities in the world," he said.

"Of course, with more targeted promotions to the longer-haul mainland cities, we believe those overnight visitors will give us better benefits, but I will stop short of making any predictions.

"But at the moment, in terms of the booking pace that we are seeing, we are at least on par with what we were seeing last year, which is already a very good year."

To celebrate the attraction's 20th anniversary, Tung said a series of events and offers will be rolled out, including cable car night rides in the summer and a special HK$88 monthly offer for Hong Kong residents.

title: 德勤：本港家辦背景多元　來自不同地區、行業及財富水平
news_content:
投資推廣署委託德勤進行的研究顯示，截至去年底，香港單一家族辦公室超過3380間，兩年間增加約680間，升幅超過25%。

德勤表示，在香港的家族辦公室背景相當多元，來自不同地區、行業和財富水平。受訪業界人士普遍認為香港較新加坡更具吸引力，受訪家族傾向選擇在香港設立單一家辦，金融機構也觀察到客戶從新加坡轉至香港的趨勢。

調查顯示，90%受訪者認為「稅務效率及優惠稅制」是香港作為家族辦公室據點的最大優勢，其次為「成熟的資本市場」，而毗鄰內地市場的地理優勢同樣備受重視。

在投資策略上，近兩成受訪單一家族辦公室計劃未來3年減持美國資產，同時所有受訪家辦表示會增加或維持香港本地配置，同時看好內地及亞太區投資機遇。未來最受青睞的行業為科技/媒體及醫療保健，其中人工智能尤其受到追捧。

研究推算，香港的單一家族辦公室在本地直接聘用超過1萬名全職專業人員，每年營運開支為本地經濟貢獻約126億元。

調查在去年10月至12月期間，透過問卷訪問了136 名香港家族辦公室業界持分者，包括121間家族辦公室，以及銀行和專業服務提供者，亦與 21名家辦及業界人士進行深入訪談。



編輯：宋家樑

title: MTR boosts rail services ahead of CNY
news_content:
The MTR Corporation says it will enhance services across multiple rail lines beginning this Friday and throughout the Chinese New Year period to accommodate increased holiday travel.

The enhancements, which include adding more than 600 extra train trips, are designed to support festive activities, including overnight services on Chinese New Year’s Eve and increased evening frequencies on the first two days of the holiday, helping passengers attend the night parade and fireworks over Victoria Harbour.

On Chinese New Year’s Eve, February 16, all local rail lines - except the Airport Express and Disneyland Resort Line - will adopt evening peak frequencies from 3pm to assist passengers travelling for reunions and celebrations. 

Overnight services, the rail giant added, will also be provided that night across all local railway lines and seven Light Rail routes.

Between this Friday and February 23, services on the East Rail Line and Island Line will be strengthened at various times. 

Additionally, the Tuen Ma Line will increase evening trips on February 17 to accommodate those attending the night parade.

For visitors heading to Disneyland, the Disneyland Resort Line will run enhanced morning services from February 17 to 23. 

The High Speed Rail will also increase service between Hong Kong West Kowloon Station and Futian Station, along with additional sleeper train trips to and from Beijingxi Station.

title: 'White paper key to One Country, Two Systems'
news_content:
A white paper on Hong Kong's role in safeguarding national security has "far-reaching significance" on the implementation of the One Country, Two Systems principle, Beijing officials overseeing the city's affairs said on Tuesday.

The five-chapter white paper, issued by the State Council, reiterates that the central government bears fundamental responsibility for national security matters concerning Hong Kong and that the SAR has to fulfil its constitutional duty.

In a statement, the Hong Kong and Macao Affairs Office said the 17-page document had taken a comprehensive look at the city's work in safeguarding national security while explaining in depth the central government's position on the matter.

The paper attaches far-reaching significance to efforts in firmly and unswervingly implementing the One Country, Two Systems principle, further safeguarding national security, and ensuring high-quality development under its governing policy, it said.

For its part, the liaison office in Hong Kong said the paper allowed for a deeper understanding of the circumstances and tasks at hand when it came to safeguarding national security.

It called the white paper a "new starting point" for Hong Kong to advance further in national security work.

The Office for Safeguarding National Security vowed to continue supporting Hong Kong fully in implementing the National Security Law, adding that measures that have been put in place to safeguard national security form a vital part of the bedrock for the sustained practice of One Country, Two Systems.

title: John Lee urges Panama to respect spirit of contracts
news_content:
Chief Executive John Lee emphasised on Tuesday that the SAR government is against the use of pressure or menacing tactics or inappropriate political means to affect trade matters in the wake of a controversial court ruling in Panama.

Lee was addressing last month's move by the Central American nation's Supreme Court to annul Hong Kong company CK Hutchison's contract to operate ports at either end of the Panama Canal by ruling that the concessions granted were "unconstitutional".

Speaking ahead of the Executive Council's meeting on Tuesday, the CE noted that the Commerce and Economic Development Bureau had earlier met Panama's consul-general to express the SAR's strong disapproval of and dissatisfaction with the ruling.

"Panama took a U-turn and their credibility has been affected. This has affected the local economy, it has also seriously affected international trade rules. We appeal to the Panama government to respect the contractual spirit," he said.

"We need to ensure that the legitimate rights of enterprises are free from any interference. Investments in relation to this regard should be protected in a fair and reasonable manner."

Lee believes the ruling has affected the confidence of Hong Kong investors in conducting business matters in the Central American nation and that they will review both existing and future investments there.

The Ministry of Foreign Affairs had said the central government would adopt any necessary measure to safeguard the legitimate rights and interests of Chinese enterprises, the chief executive noted, adding that the central government will have the full cooperation of Hong Kong.

title: 本港單一家辦數量逾3380間　為經濟帶來每年過百億元收益
news_content:
財經事務及庫務局與投資推廣署聯合宣布，根據署方委託德勤進行的《香港家族辦公室市場研究》顯示，截至去年底，香港的單一家族辦公室數目超過3380間，兩年間增加約680間，升幅超過25%。

財經事務及庫務局局長許正宇表示，香港是全球資產及財富管理的領先樞紐，家辦數目持續增長，反映政府在政策推動和制度建設上的努力已取得實質成果。他說，因應全球變局，家辦行業和資產管理正加速演變，更著重可持續增長、跨代傳承和發揮正向的社會影響力。

他強調，在「一國兩制」下，香港憑藉背靠祖國、連接全球的優勢，為家辦帶來可預測性和高增長潛力的優良發展環境。政府將持續透過多管齊下的措施推動家辦業界的發展，包括優化稅務安排、推行「新資本投資者入境計劃」、透過投資推廣署家辦專責團隊在全球各地舉辦投資推廣活動以及設立香港財富傳承學院等。

許正宇提到，局方計劃於今年上半年提交立法建議，擴展有關基金及單一家辦的優惠稅制合資格投資範圍，涵蓋例如貴金屬、貸款及私募債權投資和數字資產。在各項政策措施支持下，有信心達到去年《施政報告》訂下在2026年至2028年年底前，協助超過220間家辦來港落戶或擴展業務的新目標。

局方表示，家辦透過財務投資活動、營運管理、從事慈善事業等不同渠道，為本地經濟帶來實質貢獻。調研估算，香港的單一家辦在本地直接聘用超過1萬名全職專業人員，單是營運開支為本港經濟帶來每年約126億港元的收益。若計及聯合家辦及其他為家辦提供服務的機構，預計實際帶來的經濟效益更為可觀。

title: 日媒稱日本政府將於本月18日召集特別國會舉行首相指名選舉
news_content:
日本傳媒報道，日本政府將於本月18日召集特別國會，舉行首相指名選舉。

日本憲法規定，眾議院選舉結束後30日內須召集特別國會，進行首相指名選舉。報道說，特別國會召開當日，現任高市內閣將集體辭職，由新當選議員組成的眾議院與現有參議院分別進行投票，選出新一任首相，並據此重新組閣。

選舉在國會眾參兩院進行，在第一輪投票得票過半者即可直接勝出，若無人獲得過半票數，那麼得票數居前兩位者將進入第二輪投票，得票多者獲勝。若眾參兩院指名結果不一致，經協商仍無法達成一致時，依據憲法規定，最終以眾議院結果為準。報道說，由於自民黨在眾議院掌握三分之二以上席位，高市早苗在首相指名選舉中勝出幾無懸念。

高市早苗昨日表示，國會召開後將盡力推動2026年度預算案及相關配套法案通過。

title: 昂坪360去年客量及人均消費升　下月起每月一天推「開幕價」
news_content:
昂坪360公布，去年平均每日賓客人數及人均消費都上升，昂坪360今年踏入20周年舉辦多項活動，並會推出優惠答謝本地居民支持。

昂坪360去年平均每日賓客人數為4850人次，較對上兩年增加；人均消費整體上升4.5%，其中纜車票務收入上升1.5%，纜車以外收入則上升兩成。

去年短途地區市場表現最佳，佔接近四成；長途地區市場則佔16%。內地及本地客人就分別佔25%及20%。

纜車可靠度平均達99.98%，相等於每日營運8小時當中，平均延誤少於1分鐘。不過，纜車去年共營運304日，按年減少19日，其中受天氣因素而暫停服務的時間近9600分鐘，按年增加五成。

昂坪360董事總經理董沛銓說，公司去年除了聯乘不同品牌之外，亦有舉辦電影宣傳等，以吸引本地及海外旅客。

他說踏入20周年將會舉行多項活動，包括今年3月起至12月，每月選定一日推出88元「回到開幕價」，讓本地居民以20年前開幕時的優惠價錢，乘坐成人來回標準纜車；在暑假的特定周末晚上會有纜車夜航，並舉行音樂會。

title: 'Lai's jail term a solemn warning to collusion bids'
news_content:
Chief Executive John Lee on Tuesday said the 20-year jail term given to Jimmy Lai is a "solemn warning" to those attempting to collude with foreign forces to endanger national security. 

The 78-year-old Apple Daily founder was imprisoned on two counts of conspiracy to collude with foreign forces and a third charge of conspiracy to print seditious material. 

Lai's sentence is "a heavy punishment that sends a solemn warning against malicious plots of collusion with external elements", the chief executive said, adding that the court's ruling manifested that the rule of law is upheld. 

"His conviction is supported by overwhelming evidence and he deserves the punishment after all the harm that he has done," Lee said. 

The city's leader also criticised Western countries and politicians for "badmouthing" Hong Kong's efforts in safeguarding national security. 

"Some of the people we are taking action against are their pawns, are their representatives, are under their influence, to endanger Hong Kong's and our country's national security. It will be against their interests that we successfully neutralise their attempts," Lee said.

Asked if the authorities will appeal the sentence, Lee said the Department of Justice and police will study the court's decision in detail.

title: Importance of attending meetings hits home for owners
news_content:
Lawmaker Bill Tang on Tuesday said more home owners should be attending meetings at which procurements for and renovations to their buildings and estates were on the agenda.

His remarks came as the government proposed amendments to the Building Management Ordinance that put a cap on the number of proxies authorised to attend owners’ meetings.

It is also proposing public displays of lists of home owners who authorise representatives to attend such meetings be made mandatory and that owners be asked to declare their understanding of the agendas at these meetings.

Tang, who chairs the Legislative Council’s home affairs, culture and sports panel, told RTHK that there should be a balance between owners’ participation and a smooth operation of meetings involving them.

While a lenient participation requirement could be allowed for regular meetings, he said, the threshold should be raised for meetings involving large-scale procurement, renovations or selection of consultants.

Tang also said the government could adopt different proxy thresholds for different housing estates.

“For large-scale estates built by private developers which include shopping malls, car parks and lots of units, many home owners might have rented out their properties,” he said.

“But for flats at other large estates under the Home Ownership Scheme and Tenants Purchase Scheme, such as Wang Fuk Court, the majority are owner-occupied as rental transactions are not easily allowed.

"Since home owners live there, why can’t we raise the threshold to avoid disputes in the future?”

A representative of the Hong Kong Association of Property Management Companies, Johnnie Chan, said the amendments proposed by the government, if passed, could prove helpful in coping with proxies.

他說國家通過「十五五」規劃，繼續推動發展新質生產力，推動高質量發展及優化提升傳統產業，同時培育壯大新型產業和未來產業。香港當下面對經濟轉型期，勞動力技能需求變化，國際競爭加劇，地緣風險上升等挑戰，融入國家發展大局可帶來新空間、新動能，香港如能與國家的中長期規劃同頻共振，發揮香港背靠祖國連通世界的獨特優勢和重要作用，就能在各領域開拓新發展機遇，進一步發展經濟及改善民生。

title: 'Tai Po fire victims open to govt property buyout'
news_content:
Chief Executive John Lee on Tuesday said that a significant number of Wang Fuk Court flat owners would consider selling their properties to the government.

Speaking ahead of the weekly Executive Council meeting, Lee said authorities have collected views on the matter from most of the affected residents. 

Initial findings, he said, show that the vast majority hope authorities will expedite long-term rehousing arrangements.

"A significant proportion of flat owners have expressed willingness to consider the government's acquisition of their ownership rights," he said. 

"Some flat owners have indicated that they need to look at the actual acquisition price."

He added that a task force on accommodation arrangements, led by Deputy Financial Secretary Michael Wong, is actively working to resolve several key challenges. 

These include handling the differing needs of families in a consistent manner, addressing issues of liability and compensation uncertainty related to the building’s public insurance and managing potential legal disputes that could cause prolonged delays.

"I have instructed the task force to promptly study the feasibility of various options and the legal issues, seek advice from the Department of Justice and propose arrangements as soon as possible," he said.

The chief executive acknowledged that this is a difficult period for residents and assured that the government is working diligently to finalise a plan. 

This, he said, would allow affected residents to make the most suitable choice to rebuild their homes and lives.

Lee also noted that public funding may be used in the support arrangements, adding that officials will conduct prudent assessments to ensure effective use of resources. 

He said the aim is to strike a balance between supporting the residents and ensuring the reasonable use of public funds.

title: National security paper a call for vigilance: CE
news_content:
Chief Executive John Lee on Tuesday said a white paper released by Beijing on national security in Hong Kong is a call for continued vigilance against persistent threats.

He also said his administration will faithfully discharge its duties to safeguard national security in accordance with the requirements laid out in the paper. 

"The white paper reminds us that we must always stay vigilant against national security risks. The release of the white paper serves as the sternest warning to the traitors who betray the country and Hong Kong," Lee said.

"As the head of the SAR, I will lead and coordinate the executive authorities, the legislature and the judiciary to fulfil our responsibilities to safeguard national security."

The 17-page document released by the State Council Information Office outlined the central government's fundamental responsibility for national security matters concerning the territory, as well as Hong Kong's achievements in fulfilling its constitutional duty.

title: 羅兵咸永道：去年中國併購市場交易規模大幅回升　料今年再加速

報告指，併購市場強勁復甦，主要由境內戰略投資主導，全年這類併購交易3639宗，涉及交易額2390億美元，當中34宗超大型交易，逾半數由國資牽頭，多集中於半導體、人工智能、新能源等國家戰略產業，反映政策引導行業深化整合。

去年中資企業海外併購亦顯著反彈，全年升5%至272宗，交易額升88%至230億美元；當中7宗屬超大型海外併購，按年翻倍增長，主要集中於歐洲消費品行業。

羅兵咸永道預料，今年併購活動進一步加速，受惠於內地產業加快升級、A股龍頭企業再融資環境有望寬鬆、國企改革與上市公司整合，均催生更多行業整合交易。

另外，香港資本市場估值回升，將刺激私募股權基金趁項目上市退出交易增加。報告指出，去年香港市場有70宗IPO退出交易，數字創新高。

title: 駐港國安公署：香港維護國家安全工作取得歷史性成就
news_content:
駐港國家安全公署發言人表示，《「一國兩制」下香港維護國家安全的實踐》白皮書，全面回顧香港維護國家安全的不平凡歷程，清晰闡明中央堅定維護國家安全、捍衛「一國兩制」的原則立場，深入總結「一國兩制」下香港維護國家安全的經驗啓示，為進一步推進香港維護國家安全工作指明方向，為進一步凝聚以高水平安全護航「一國兩制」事業高質量發展的共識，注入強大動能。

發言人指出，當前香港維護國家安全面臨的形勢依然嚴峻複雜，鬥爭依然尖銳激烈，駐港國家安全公署將一如既往堅定依法履職，踐行國安法治，切實發揮職能作用，全力支持香港特區全面準確實施香港國安法律，堅決防範打擊外部勢力干擾破壞。

發言人說，香港國安法制定出台，有力堵塞香港維護國家安全的法律漏洞，成為香港由亂到治的「分水嶺」，開啓「一國兩制」實踐的新征程，又認為《香港國安法》制定實施5年多，法治效能充分彰顯，反中亂港首惡分子被依法定罪判刑，外部干預受到堅決有力反制，敵對勢力再不能肆無忌憚為所欲為，香港維護國家安全工作取得歷史性成就，國家主權、安全、發展利益得到有力維護。

發言人指出，國家安全屬於中央事權，中央政府對香港特區有關的國家安全事務負有根本責任，強調維護國家安全是「一國兩制」實踐行穩致遠的重要基礎，《香港國安法》權威不容挑戰，香港維護國家安全的正義行動和法治實踐，不容任何外部勢力插手和干預。

title: 維護國家安全白皮書提及黎智英案裁決　法治尊嚴有力捍衛
news_content:
國務院新聞辦公室發布的《「一國兩制」下香港維護國家安全的實踐》白皮書指出，香港特區切實履行維護國家安全的憲制責任，提及歷史性完成香港基本法第23條立法；持續完善香港本地維護國家安全的法律制度；有力開展維護國家安全執法和司法。白皮書提到，香港高等法院就黎智英涉嫌違反《香港國安法》和本地有關法律案件作出裁決，黎智英兩項串謀勾結外國勢力罪及一項串謀發布煽動刊物罪成；特區亦扎實推進國家安全宣傳教育。

白皮書認為，香港實現由亂到治走向由治及興。政權安全有效維護，治理效能顯著提升，從根本上保證特區管治權由堅定愛國者掌握；法治尊嚴有力捍衛，社會秩序恢復穩定；營商環境持續優化，經濟發展蓬勃興旺；權利自由更有保障，市民福祉日益增進。

白皮書指出，要以高水平安全護航「一國兩制」事業高質量發展，堅持中央政府根本責任和特區憲制責任相統一，面對複雜多變形勢，必須把握維護國家安全貫徹「一國兩制」實踐全過程，中央政府支持香港特區及時研究解決出現的新情況、新問題，持續完善香港維護國家安全制度機制，提升維護國家安全的能力和水平。

白皮書指，堅持把特區管治權牢牢掌握在愛國者手中，在這個大是大非問題上，必須立場堅定、旗幟鮮明，任何時候都不能動搖，必須堅定走符合香港實際情況的民主發展道路，通過舉行高質量的選舉，把愛國愛港立場堅定、管治能力突出、熱心服務公衆的賢能人才，選入管治團隊，必須堅持和完善行政主導，推動行政與立法良性互動，不斷提升特區治理效能。

白皮書又表示，堅持尊重和保障人權；堅持在法治軌道上維護安全；堅持統籌發展和安全，要更重視金融、航運、貿易以及海外利益保護等非傳統領域的安全，切實防範外部敵對勢力干預破壞，進一步健全反制裁、反干預、反「長臂管轄」制度機制；以及堅持在開放中維護安全。中央政府將一如既往保持香港資本主義制度和生活方式長期不變，保持香港國際自由港和單獨關稅區地位長期不變等。

title: 維護國家安全白皮書：香港維護國家安全鬥爭從未停止
news_content:
國務院新聞辦公室發布《「一國兩制」下香港維護國家安全的實踐》白皮書，全面總結香港維護國家安全的實踐歷程和經驗啓示，正本清源、凝聚共識，以高水平安全護航「一國兩制」事業高質量發展。

白皮書表示，香港維護國家安全的鬥爭從未停止。中國政府堅定捍衛國家主權、安全、發展利益；基本法第23條立法長期是鬥爭焦點；「修例風波」對香港維護國家安全造成最嚴峻挑戰。中央政府必須採取措施，迅速構築香港維護國家安全法律制度屏障，以有效化解國家安全面臨的重大現實威脅。

白皮書指出，中央政府對香港有關的國家安全事務負有根本責任。維護國家安全是中央事權；出台《香港國安法》「一法安香江」；完善香港選舉制度，守牢特別行政區管治權。中央採取的舉措有效維護國家安全，有力維護香港憲制秩序，沉重打擊反中亂港勢力，對香港迅速止暴制亂、實現由亂到治的歷史性轉折，發揮決定性作用，在「一國兩制」實踐進程中具有重要的里程碑意義。

title: HK stocks up, Nikkei continues ascent
news_content:
Asian stocks advanced for a second day in early trading on Tuesday, led by an extended rally in Tokyo's benchmark.

In Hong Kong, the Hang Seng Index opened 175 points, or 0.6 percent, higher at 27,202.

The China Enterprises Index was 58 points, or 0.6 percent, higher at 9,226 while the tech index was 44 points, or 0.8 percent higher at 5,461.

On the mainland, the benchmark Shanghai Composite Index opened up 0.11 percent at 4,127.

The Shenzhen Component Index was 0.05 percent lower at 14,200 while the ChiNext Index, tracking China's Nasdaq-style board of growth enterprises, was down 0.33 percent at 3,321.

MSCI's broadest index of Asia-Pacific shares outside Japan was up 0.4 percent while the Nikkei 225 jumped 2.1 percent, rising for a third consecutive day to a fresh record high.

US equity futures cooled off after a two-day rally, with S&P 500 e-mini futures down 0.1 percent, partially retracing gains on Wall Street overnight. On Monday, the S&P 500 rose 0.5 percent and the Nasdaq Composite gained 0.9 percent as technology ‍stocks found their footing following last week's AI-sparked selloff.

"Overall, we actually are quite positive on ⁠the economic situation, although we see maybe some cracks," said Kees Verbaas, Robeco’s global head of fundamental equity.

"The investment programs ‍of the large companies are increasing rather than decreasing... which typically is good for economic activity. A lot of the AI supply chain is only possible thanks to emerging markets.”

With several critical economic reports due for release this week, including retail sales, inflation and delayed payrolls data, White House economic adviser Kevin Hassett said overnight that US job  gains could be lower in the coming months as the Trump administration's immigration policies slow labour force growth and new AI tools boost productivity.

Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said as well that senior US Treasury staff visited China last week "to strengthen channels of communication" between Washington and Beijing.

Market pricing continues to indicate that the Federal Reserve will remain on hold until June. Fed funds futures are pricing an implied 17.7 percent probability of a 25-basis-point rate cut at the US central bank's next two-day meeting on March 18, compared to a 18.4 percent chance on Friday, according to the CME Group's FedWatch tool. (Reuters & Xinhua)

title: Murder probe launched over blunt force trauma killing
news_content:
A murder investigation has been launched following the death of a 63-year-old man, who is believed to have been attacked with a blunt object in Tuen Mun.

Police were called to a village house on San Sau Street at 6.41pm on Monday, where officers found the man unconscious on a bed with serious head injuries.

He was pronounced dead at the scene. 

Sources indicate the victim's wife has been taken into custody.

A post-mortem examination will be conducted to determine the exact cause of death, and the case remains under active investigation by the Tuen Mun crime squad.

State Council issues white paper on HK security
news_content:
The State Council Information Office on Monday released a white paper on the "persistent" fight to safeguard national security in Hong Kong, saying it wants to clear up any confusion and misunderstandings surrounding the issue.

The 17-page document lays out the central government's fundamental responsibility for national security matters concerning the SAR, while highlighting Hong Kong's achievements.

It said national security is a top priority for the country, as it is the foundation of social stability and safeguards people’s wellbeing.

The paper says while both central and local authorities have always aimed to develop a stable and prosperous Hong Kong, their efforts have been obstructed by both internal and external forces.

"Our effort has been obstructed and undermined by anti-China agitators in Hong Kong and hostile external forces, who have employed all possible means in their attempt to turn Hong Kong into an independent or semi-independent political entity, severely challenging the One Country, Two Systems principle.

"The struggle to safeguard national security in Hong Kong is persistent. The central government bears the fundamental responsibility for affairs concerning national security in the HKSAR, while the HKSAR shoulders the constitutional responsibility for safeguarding national security."

The paper credited the SAR government's efforts towards this end, saying its sound governance has propelled the city into a new stage, "advancing towards prosperity and showing signs of an even brighter future."

It says Hong Kong's efforts to safeguard national security have been "extraordinary" – noting the passage of the homegrown national security law, authorities' crackdown on national security crimes, and their efforts to beef up national security education.

These hard-won achievements, it said, are widely recognised and must be cherished.

"A safe Hong Kong that is free, developed, open, and vibrant aligns fully with the One Country, Two Systems policy, serves China’s fundamental interests, benefits the residents of Hong Kong, and meets the interests of external investors", it said.

The paper said the central government "firmly supports" the SAR in implementing the One Country, Two Systems policy, and carrying out its constitutional responsibility for safeguarding national security.

"Hong Kong, enjoying high-standard security, is bound to overcome all risks and challenges on the journey forward, and remain as steady as a rock in a turbulent world", the paper concluded.

title: 李家超指黎智英重囚20年　對勾結外力危害國安圖謀發嚴厲警告
news_content:
行政長官李家超表示，背叛國家和香港特區的黎智英昨日被法庭重判入獄20年，刑期對勾結外部勢力危害國家安全的歹毒圖謀，發出了嚴厲警告。

李家超出席行政會議前，批評黎智英罪行滔天、惡貫滿盈，被重判入獄20年，彰顯法治，伸張正義。黎智英長期利用《蘋果日報》荼毒市民、煽動仇恨、歪曲事實、蓄意製造社會對立、美化暴力，公然乞求外部勢力制裁中國、制裁香港特區，犧牲人民福祉，賣國禍港，損害國家和香港特區利益，罪證纍纍，罪有應得。

李家超又說，法庭早前頒下的裁決，清楚指出黎智英是案中主腦，控制和利用《蘋果日報》荼毒社會、勾結外國勢力、乞求對中國和香港特區實施制裁和採取敵對行動，對方的歹毒圖謀跨越《香港國安法》實施前後，目的是勾結外部勢力，損害中國和香港特區利益，危害國家安全，法庭依法對黎智英和各被告作出重判，彰顯了法治和公義。

但李家超指出，社會已承受沉重代價，在黎智英和他所操控《蘋果日報》的荼毒下，部分市民，尤其是青年人，被誤導而違反法律，變得激進暴戾。截至去年底有2400多人因「黑暴」期間所犯的各種罪行，承擔法律後果，可見黎智英團夥及《蘋果日報》的惡貫滿盈。

李家超說，香港特區政府已完成《基本法》第23條本地立法，制定了《維護國家安全條例》，而《香港國安法》和《維護國家安全條例》渾然一體，築起維護國家安全的法律屏障，特區會堅定不移維護國家安全，保障香港市民的合法權益，全力防範、制止和懲治危害國家安全的行為和活動，履行天經地義的維護國家安全責任。



編輯：黃佩珊

title: 中聯辦：白皮書發表是新起點　香港維護國家安全工作將向縱深推進

發言人說，白皮書有助更全面理解維護國家主權、安全、發展利益是「一國兩制」方針的最高原則，更深刻認識香港維護國家安全面臨的形勢任務和實踐要求，準確把握貫徹總體國家安全觀、護航高質量發展的方向。

發言人指出，維護國家安全沒有完成時，只有進行時，白皮書發表是新起點，香港維護國家安全工作將向縱深推進，持續以高水平安全護航高質量發展，也堅信在中央全力支持下，香港維護國家安全的法律體系和執行機制定能固根本、穩預期、利長遠，促進香港健步邁向由治及興，實現良政善治，更好融入和服務國家發展大局。
